original_title: Flávio Dornelles – Palcos de Minha Vida
overview: Recognized in Rio Grande do Sul (RS) for his career in theatre, Flávio Dornelles built and consolidated his artistic career in Pelotas since the early 1980s, a period in which he began his work as an actor on the local stages, later going on to perform as actor in several cities of RS and in many states of Brazil.
title: Flávio Dornelles – Palcos de Minha Vida
